mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invoice_head (invoiceid, iqseqno, status, lxdm, invoiceType, xsfTax, xsfName, xsfAddr, xsfBank, gmfTax, gmfName, gmfAddr, gmfBank, operator, checker, fpRQ, fpDM, fpHM, fpSKM, fpJYM, fpEWM, yfpDM, yfpHM, pdf, totalAmt, totalTaxAmt, totalTaxFee, memo, xfzEmail, xfzPhone, taxversion, zsfs, BYZD1, BYZD2, BYZD3, BYZD4, BYZD5, BYZD6, BYZD7, isList) VALUES (#{invoiceid},#{ iqseqno},#{ status},#{ lxdm},#{ invoicetype},#{ xsftax},#{ xsfname},#{ xsfaddr},#{ xsfbank},#{ gmftax},#{ gmfname},#{ gmfaddr},#{ gmfbank},#{ operator},#{ checker},#{ fprq},#{ fpdm},#{ fphm},#{ fpskm},#{ fpjym},#{ fpewm},#{ yfpdm},#{ yfphm},#{ pdf},#{ totalamt},#{ totaltaxamt},#{ totaltaxfee},#{ memo},#{ xfzemail},#{ xfzphone},#{ taxversion},#{ zsfs},#{ byzd1},#{ byzd2},#{ byzd3},#{ byzd4},#{ byzd5},#{ byzd6},#{ byzd7},#{ islist})

INSERT INTO invoice_detail (invoiceid, seqno, rowno, unit, spec, qty, price, amount, taxrate, taxfee, amt, goodsid, goodsname, taxitemid, fphxz, zhdyhh, yhzcbs, lslbs, zzstsgl) VALUES
(#{detail.invoiceid},#{detail.seqno},#{detail.rowno},#{detail.unit},#{detail.spec},#{detail.qty},#{detail.price},#{detail.amount},#{detail.taxrate},#{detail.taxfee},#{detail.amt},#{detail.goodsid},#{detail.goodsname},#{detail.taxitemid},#{detail.fphxz},#{detail.zhdyhh},#{detail.yhzcbs},#{detail.lslbs},#{detail.zzstsgl})
mapper.select: select count(*) from invoice_head where invoiceType =0 and status=100 and iqseqno=#{iqseqno}
mapper.update: update invoice_head set status =#{status} where iqseqno=#{iqseqno} and fpDM=#{fpDM} and fpHM=#{fpHM}
update invoice_head set pdf =#{pdf} where iqseqno=#{iqseqno} and fpDM=#{fpDM} and fpHM=#{fpHM}
mapper.select: select count(*) from invoice_head where fpDM = #{rtfpdm} and fpHM = #{rtfphm}
select * from invoice_head where fpDM = #{fpDM} and fpHM = #{fpHM}
SELECT count(*) from invoice_detail where invoiceid=#{invoiceid}
